metadata.title: CVE-2022-1319 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow. For an AJP 400 response, EAP 7 is improperlysending two response packets, and those packets have the reuse flag seteven though JBoss EAP closes the connection. A failure occurs when theconnection is reused after a 400 by CPING since it reads in the secondSEND_HEADERS response packet instead of a CPONG.

criterions.comment: undertow package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
